details.region: Open to everyone around the world! (But it could take a long time to get to you!)
details.questKeyLocations:
You're going to have to hunt! The quest keys may show up in annotations within any of my non-vlog, photography-related, videos from this year. I'll bet you can make educated guesses as to which videos might contain the quest keys. Note: YouTube annotations don't show up on some (any?) phone/tablet apps. It's probably best to use a browser to make sure you can see them!

Keys may also appear in tags of certain photos posted to my Flickr photostream this year. If you don't know my Flickr photostream, you'll have to figure that out, too.

quests.text:
What (very specific) color is my Porsche Boxster?
I mean the exact name of the paint color.
I've vlogged about two Nikon 35mm film cameras I've bought within the past 365 days. What were they?
Find my flickr.com photostream. What are the names of my three 'bestest college buddies'?
On my tumblr blog there is a photo titled 'Plymouth'.  What is the state of the license plate on the car?
Pick a favorite photo from my flickr stream from this year (2015).  Tell me why you like it.
